trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [total number of dots v] to [0] ask [Please enter 5 cards ('B' for black and 'W' for white):] and wait set [cards v] to (answer) if <(letter (1) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (16)) end if <(letter (2) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (8)) end if <(letter (3) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (4)) end if <(letter (4) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (2)) end if <(letter (5) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (1)) end say (total number of dots)
